description:
This interactive game teaches is the follow-up of the Router Game by
Roberto Polli, and teaches various TCP / IP protocols using paper and
pen.

Participants are divided in teams, simulating exchanges through
various protocols (DNS, TCP, IP)

Every player has an L3 role: a PC or mobile phone, a Router, a Load
Balancer ... and must communicate with the others following the
associate specification (eg. a TCP client may buffer frames, a Load
Balancer re-encapsulates IP datagram, ... )

The team which is faster in exhanging messages wins.
title: TCP / IP Animated
